channel.title: Please look need help
channel.description: hey guys i have a server and all i need to do now is get it on 2 a download website so all you people can download and play could anyone tell me what to 2 ?

item.title: Please look need help
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

You can go to mediafire.com or www.filefactory.com/ or uppit.com

First you need winrar to make the server into a archived file.

Right click the file and click add to archive, choose a location and click continue.

Then go to one of the hosting websites and upload the “yourservername.rar”

Read full topic

item.title: Please look need help
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Theres thousands of tuts,

You need to basically,
Port forward your router.
Mask your IP
Register on Mopar server status page
Set the client to connect to your masked IP
Upload your server to a hosting site such as mediafire or megaupload

Read full topic
